definition: to sign up/to enter one's name/to apply/to register/to enroll/to enlist
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: He thought I was signing up for a drawing class in order to see nude girls.
sentences.chinese: 他以爲我爲了去看裸體姑娘而報名了一個美術課。

sentences.english: Entry form will be destroyed before the commencement of next Music Festival.
sentences.chinese: 報名表將於來屆音樂節開始前銷燬。

sentences.english: A $100 registration fee per team is required.
sentences.chinese: 每隊必須交100美元的報名費。

sentences.english: Please complete registration form below and turn into your teacher or PTA .
sentences.chinese: 請詳細填寫報名表後交給班級老師或家長會。

sentences.english: Entry form is invalid if not properly completed or with insufficient supporting materials.
sentences.chinese: 報名表填寫不清或資料不齊者，一概視爲無效。

sentences.english: All applicants need to hand over three recent photos.
sentences.chinese: 報名者都需交三張近影。

sentences.english: Please read the Notes before Application before filling out this application form.
sentences.chinese: 填寫報名表前，請先詳讀招生簡章上的報名注意事項。

sentences.english: Please read the Notes before Application before filling out this application form.
sentences.chinese: 填寫報名表前，請先詳讀招生簡章上的報名注意事項。

sentences.english: However, as soon as my parents left, I signed up Classical Literature.
sentences.chinese: 可是等父母一離開，我立刻報名學習古典文學。

sentences.english: Anyone who would like to request teachings from Rinpoche, kindly register early for a private interview.
sentences.chinese: 如需向仁波切請法，請預先報名以便通知。

sentences.english: I was late signing up because of my job.
sentences.chinese: 我報名晚了是果爲爾在農息。

sentences.english: Hm, thank you. Now, please fill in this form.
sentences.chinese: 完成交費的考生，請填寫好報名表，填好後提交。

sentences.english: I enrolled in an online school to become a private investigator.
sentences.chinese: 我報名參加網絡學校想成爲私家審查員。

sentences.english: The refund hereby refers to the tuition, not including the registration fee.
sentences.chinese: 此處所指退費僅限學費，報名費恕不退還。

sentences.english: The applicants are required in 18-50 age range.
sentences.chinese: 報名者年齡須在18週歲以上50週歲以下。

definition: quota/number of places/place (in an institution, a group etc)
to place an order/to book ahead
to enter oneself for an examination
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
